recommendations.item:
Visits every 4 weeks until 32 weeks - weight, blood pressure, urine for protein/glucose,
symphysis fundal height, fetal heart beyond 12 weeks. BLUE items are for residents,
RED are chart audit items

item.name: cl0h1
item.FONT: Antenatal 1 started once EDC is established and SIGN

item.name: cl0p1
item.I: Complete physical exam including breast exam

week.item: Pap - may defer if patients low risk and recent PAP < 12 months
Record uterine size in wks under uterus on antenatal 1 - physical exam
GC/Chlamydia Cultures; if already had speculum exam do urine chlamydia

item.name: cl0l2
item.B: Rh, rubella, VDRL, hepatitis B screen, CBC

week.item: Consider varicella titre

item.name: cl0o2
item.FONT: Send Msg to Dr. Chan re this patient

week.item: Recommend .4 mg of folic acid to prevent neural tube defects
HIV testing discussed
(RISK: 1st Trimester Bleed):Consider Ectopic
(RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling
(RISK: Occup. & Environ.):Assess Occupational/Environmental Risk
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)Monitor serum levels of anticonvulsants
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)A higher daily dose of folic acid 5 mg is recommended until 12 weeks
(RISK: Age > 35):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
(RISK: At risk-Tay-Sach..):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
(RISK: chromosome abn.):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
(RISK: NTD):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
(RISK: NTD):A higher daily dose of folic acid 4 mg is recommended until 12 weeks
(RISK: Dev. delay):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
(RISK: Congen.anomalies):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
(RISK: Chromo defect):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
(RISK: CF, MD..):Refer for genetic counseling and possible testing
Record lab at the top of antenal 1
Review need for iron, rh immune globulin
Give MSS brochure
Review and encourage breast feeding if undecided at first visit

item.name: cl12n7
item.FONT: MUST Book visit with Dr. Price at 16 wks

week.item: (RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling
(RISK: Prev. Stillbirth)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Prev. SGA)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Prev. PTL/PROM)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Prev. GBS)Counsel re recommendations for GBS prophylaxis in labour
(RISK: Prev. Abruption)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Prev. HTN disease of pregnancy)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(Risk: Prev. C/S)Request copy of previous operative note
(RISK: Prev. C/S)Verify a lower transverse incision on an operative report
(RISK: Prev. C/S)Counsel regarding VBAC
(RISK: Hypertension)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Hypertension)Obtain baseline renal function
(RISK: Diabetes)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Heart Disease)if significant heart disease consider referral to an obstetrician/perinatologist for full ca
(RISK: Renal Diasese)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: GI problem)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Neurological Disease)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)Consider consultation with an obstetrician and/or neurologist
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)Monitor serum levels of anticonvulsants
(RISK: Herpes)Discuss the current recommendations regarding C/S and herpes infection
(RISK: Surgical/anesthesia problem)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: Hospitalization)Consider consultation with an obstetrician
(RISK: BMI < 20)Counsel re recommended weight gain of 12-18 kg
(RISK: BMI=20-25)Counsel re recommended weight gain of 11-16 kg
(RISK: BMI > 25)Counsel re recommended weight gain of 7-11 kg
Give MSS req n if patient has consented and have patient sign form
Give patient the hospital prenatal clinic package
Ask patient to complete Healthy Eating Checklist and ALPHA self-report

item.name: cl16n9
item.FONT: Send AR forms and BW results to SJH and MC

week.item: (RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)Monitor serum levels of anticonvulsants
Record date of quickening
Continue antenatal 2 discussion topics - physical and emotional changes, signs and symptoms of preterm labor, labor and pregnancy support
Give patient education pamphlet on preterm labour

item.name: cl20n4
item.B: Reinforce or discuss breast feeding plans

week.item: (RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling
Pre-registration pkg to patient
Send prenatal pkg to Labor and Delivery
Consider 75 gm GTT
(RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling

item.name: cl24r3
item.a: Screen for bacterial vaginosis at the 24 week visit

week.item: (RISK: Seizure Disorder)Monitor serum levels of anticonvulsants
Give copy of antenatal 2 for patient to carry with her

item.name: cl28n3
item.B: Review social risks from page 1 - consider a Healthy Babies referral

week.item: Counsel regarding signs and symptoms of preterm labour

item.name: cl28n7
item.FONT: MUST Book visit with Dr. Price at 32 wks

week.item: (RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling
(RISK: Prev. SGA)Consdider ultrasound to verify fetal growth and fluid volume
(Risk: Prev. C/S)Make sure operative note is on the chart #
(RISK: Hypertension)Consider ultrasound for fetal growth and fluid volume
Discussion topics - birth plan, pain relief? Anaesthetic consult? Circumcision?
Signs of labour onset, SROM, how to get in touch with the doctor
Either group B strep screening at 36 weeks (lower vagina, peineum and perianal) OR intrapartum prophylaxis for women with risks
Counsel regarding signs and symptoms of preterm labour

item.name: cl32n6
item.FONT: MUST Double Book visit with Dr. Price at 36 wks

week.item: Pre-registration appt made?
(RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling
(RISK: Prev. SGA)Consdider ultrasound to verify fetal growth and fluid volume
(RISK: Hypertension)Consider ultrasound for fetal growth and fluid volume
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)Monitor serum levels of anticonvulsants
Counsel regarding signs and symptoms of preterm labour
Review birth plan - who will be there for support?
Early discharge plans (may stay up to 60 hrs.), postpartum plans
Check fetal lie - if Breech consider referral for version @ 36 weeks
GBS screen
(RISK: Smoking):Smoking Cessation Counselling
(RISK: Prev. SGA)Consdider ultrasound to verify fetal growth and fluid volume
(RISK: Prev. GBS)Counsel re recommendations for GBS prophylaxis in labour
(RISK: Hypertension)Consider ultrasound for fetal growth and fluid volume
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)Monitor serum levels of anticonvulsants
(RISK: Seizure Disorder)Consider vitamin K supplementation
(RISK: Herpes)Discuss the option of acyclovir prophylaxis, particularly if the patient has had a recurrence during this pregnancy

item.FONT: Carry OB pager as of 38 weeks, give pager # and home # to paging

item.FONT: If working with a buddy, introduce your buddy to the patient
